item.title: Python seaborn Package Guide
item.description: Introduction I’m learning data visualization in Python and I see myself as a ‘hands on’ learner, so I’ll be reproducing some basic plots using seaborn package that you can use as a reference everytime you need to fresh up your memory. At first is required that the packages are properly imported, after that I load the iris dataset. import pandas as pd import seaborn as sns import matplotlib.pyplot as plt url = "https://git.
